login.text: Welcome back! Please enter your master password to unlock your account.

0.description: Enter your Beta Access Code. If you don’t have a beta access code please join our waitlist by visiting our website. We’ll notify you with a beta access code via email as soon as we’re ready for you.

2.description: Choose your email. This can be what your mama calls you or your friends or a completely made up string. Up to you, that's really none of our business.

4.description: Soooo, you spilled coffee on your computer and now it doesn't work?! This email address can be used to retrieve your encrypted data (if you opted to store your encrypted data on our cloud backup).

5.description: In the event you lose your password or device, this phrase can be used to restore your account. Be sure to memorize this phrase or keep it somewhere secure like a under your pillow.

register.passInstructions: This password will be the only password you’ll ever need to enter any Telios services. Upon creation of your password a private encryption key will be generated on your local computer and be known only to you.
register.strongDesc: Not bad, but you can do better...
register.veryStrongDesc: This is a very unguessable password!
register.timeDescription: Is roughly how long it would take to crack this password at 10k guesses per second
register.tooWeakErr: This password is too weak to safely use.
register.betaCodeNotValid: Invalid Beta Access Code. If you received this code from us, please reach out to Support.

form.recoveryEmaiAlreadyUsed: Recovery email is already in use.
form.betaConsent: Consent is required for the Beta
